website_summaries.verdict: Double-stitched elastic ensures these sheets stay put – an important safety consideration for newborns.
pros: Fits standard mattresses sold for mini cribs, porta cribs, and Pack n Play playards, as well as Pack n Play mattress
Unisex.Measures 24" x 38" x 5".Elastic reinforced twice for durability
cons: These sheets may shrink if you put them in the dryer, so consider air-drying them

customer_reviews.title: Fits Pack n Play well.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fit our Graco pack n play super well. I washed both sheets on warm, tumble dried on low heat and both sheets still fit well. Happy with the quality though I can see how this material might pill over time. Love the design and look!
customer_reviews.author: cabbs

customer_reviews.title: Fits Fisher-Price Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We have a Fisher-Price Soothing Motions bassinet, and I was frustrated that Fisher-Price doesn't sell spare covers for the bassinet pad. Several reviewers of the bassinet said that these sheets fit the pad, and they were right! I have been so pleased that they fit - no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: roguelobster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but cause the pack-n-play mattress to buckle
customer_reviews.text: These do work well. They fit snugly. They are a nice cotton material which is better than the shiny slippery vinyl pack-n-play mattress. HOWEVER the sheets fit so snugly and are so tight that the pack-n-play mattress folds/buckles/bends and becomes too short to fit the entire length of the pack-n-play, resulting in a leftover empty space with no mattress to fill, which our baby sometimes falls into and can't get out of.
customer_reviews.author: highflyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are amazing. They fit my daughter's average sized mattress perfectly. The elastic synching feels durable, like it won't get stretched out anytime soon. The sheet quality seems to be better than the Aden & Anais sheets I bought for the same crib and they're half the price! I'd suggest these to anyone. These also work great to wrap around her pack n play to make a sort of "tent" and sound barrier. Picture included of this ingenious invention. I also loved the Breathable Baby Mesh Crib liner that is also pictured in the crib photo.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality and fit but smelly upon opening
customer_reviews.text: ts fit my mini-crib mattress and seem soft. I was disappointed by how smelly they were out of the package. They smell much worse than the other sheet I bought - much more chemically, which concerns me. I haven't washed them yet; still deciding whether this toxic odor is a deal breaker or not. Don't want to wash them and still have them smell, and not able to return them!
customer_reviews.author: Emily T.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I use a pack n play for my son to sleep in next to my bed. I used the insert that comes with it instead of a pack n play mattress so all the other sheets I tried were too big and I kept having to tighten them. These ones fit perfectly with the pack n play insert, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: nataliefig21

customer_reviews.title: good quality, cute sheets
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought crib sheets that were made out of muslin cotton. This was a bad idea since I was using them together with a Halo sleepsack which comes with the velcro. Muslin cotton ones were soft and felt nice but I was pulling the threads all the time. Now I bought these sheets anew and they are great. They are durable so I don't have to worry about them during the daily use. They are cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Moominchoco

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Soft and washes up nice, but just too short/small for a full-size bassinet causing it to bow. Unfortunately I washed it before putting it on so not sure if it shrunk in the dryer or if the product was just short to begin with but either way it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love these!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these sheets! I think the price is super reasonable for such a high quality product. The other sheets I bought for my little one's crib were either Carter's brand or Gerber brand, but I'm happy to say that these surpassed them both. They are super comfy for my little guy (a lot more soft and cozy than any previous crib sheets I've bought) and they also have a thicker elastic band when it comes to fitting the crib mattress. Very pleased with this purchase and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. We registered for this brand for our changing table, bassinet, and pack and play. The only one that is holding up is the pack and play. The quality is terrible after a few washes. While the style and design seem great, I can't believe after 3 washes the sheets are totally ruined. I would recommend a different brand if you are looking to purchase this for your changing table or bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: kleonard1122

customer_reviews.title: ... that come with these products are so thin and easily manipulated that the elastic on the sheets cause the ...
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for my bassinet and SnuggleMe co-sleeper but the pads that come with these products are so thin and easily manipulated that the elastic on the sheets cause the pad to crumple and no longer lay flat, this is not a manufacturing issue but I am having a hard time finding extra sheets for these products. They shrunk slightly after being washed in cold and tumble dry low, making them even more useless for what I was going to use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy2009

customer_reviews.title: Soft and nice
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fits perfectly. Doesn’t slide off easily. One think is that hair sticks to it easily and hard to get off. Have to go over it with a lint roller a few times. Since it’s a lighter color, it tend to stains easily. Washed it once with a gentle baby detergent but stain still noticeable. Afraid to use harsh detergent because baby’s skin is sensitive. Baby sleeps well on it and mommy is at ease knowing that the sheet is comfortable and won’t roll up because baby is moving a lot now.
customer_reviews.author: Celery

customer_reviews.title: Causes safety issues
customer_reviews.text: Very soft sheet that washes well. The problem is that it’s fitted so snugly that it causes the pack n play mattress to buckle at the folds which causes it to loose some length and doesn’t fit under the pockets that are meant to keep the mattress in place. As well as causing bulges in the mattress when it’s supposed to be perfectly flat. Just doesn’t seem safe for a baby to be sleeping on.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snuggly
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft, light, and large! I used these in the summer a lot with my newborn and she still loves to snuggle with them at 7 months old. They are a beautiful quality and wash well. When I take them out of the dryer they appear wrinkled but they straighten out on their own with use. I would definitely buy these again or even for a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Comfortble sheet
customer_reviews.text: The Elys & Co 2 pack porta crib sheet set arrived on time and securely packed. The prints I picked, white with grey chevron stripes and white with grey polka dots are very pretty and babyish. They fit just right on my standard porta crib mattress but looks likebit can fit a thicker mattress too. I've been using the sheets now for 2 weeks and find them soft and comfortable. I've washed them numerous times and its holding up beautifully. It did not fade nor pimple. Overall a great product, great fit and quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too small
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is good overall. I like the cotton feel, it is a bit thin but that doesn't bother me. However, the biggest problem is size---the sheets make the insert pad bunched up and bent. The elastic is too strong, nothing that can't be fixed if you're able. Pictures show bent mattress after I removed some elastic out. When purchased it was bent even more, that's why I gave it only 3 stars. Dimensions of my bassinet mattress are 14.5 inches x 29 inches x 1 inch.
customer_reviews.author: korki051

customer_reviews.title: Thin but Soft
customer_reviews.text: Purchased matching crib and changing pad covers. The changing pad cover arrived with a hole in the corner seam and was replaced by amazon/seller quickly and easily. The covers are on the thin side which I'm fine with me but are soft. Perfect for a gender neutral nursery. Planning to purchase the playyard covers as well.
customer_reviews.author: sn0princess

customer_reviews.title: Target is cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is good product, however the demension online is not 100% accurate. I also found the price is at the higher end, after I bought the product and one of my fiend told me to purchase them at target as they are only $10 for 2. the target one is the same quality and cheaper. Probably will not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: ya ru

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit my 4Moms Pack and play great. They are slightly tight- but I found that even with the sheets made for the pack and play specifically. The price on these are SO much better- great buy! They are soft and easy to clean. The patterns are cute and could be used for girls or boys (I have a son).
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Good changing pad covers for 16" x 32" changing pads
customer_reviews.text: Nice changing pad covers, nice design. Fits our 16" x 32" contoured changing pad perfectly. They do not have a waterproof lining, but it turns out it's not necessary since the changing pad itself is waterproof. After 6 months of use, one of the covers has a 2 inch hole near the elastic lining. It's not noticeable unless you're removing it or placing it back on the changing pad. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MK Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit miclassic bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it said it fit the miclassic bassinet but it did not and caused the bassinet mattress to bunch up because it was too small creating a large bump in the middle and I cannot imagine that is safe to sleep that way. The patterns were cute and everything but incorrect sizing
customer_reviews.author: amandamae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: My package came in one day which I loved because I am about to have my baby any day now and wanted to make sure this fit the playpen mattress I bought and it does perfectly! It fits standard play yard mattresses. With the fast delivery I was able to wash it and set it up for baby, also love that it's a two pack for those little accidents that babies have so often
customer_reviews.author: peta

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very soft cotton and for the hiccapop pack n play mattress that I purchased for our pack n play to make it feel softer for my little one. This item has gotten some mixed reviews but so far I am very pleased. The package arrived on time and in excellent condition, no issues with the packaging. No bad smell when out of the package. I washed them before use and they didn’t shrink at all. I am an actual, verified purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Baudo

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feel of these sheets but they don't fit the bassinet that I bought them for. These are actually recommended when you buy the MiClassic. I cannot use them and I have already washed them. Too bad I didn't look at other reviews on this product because it looks like other people warned of this problem. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and safe for baby
customer_reviews.text: I have an oval bassinet and this fits great and stretches and I could see how it would fit even larger sizes. Comfortable for baby and soft and stylish and easy to wash and care for, even without fabric softener. Great solution for sensitive skin babies
customer_reviews.author: Htomato

customer_reviews.title: Seems good quality and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit perfectly on the standard pad for our Graco pack n play. I washed and dried the sheets to make sure but did not have an issue with shrinkage or with the sheets causing the pad to bow as other reviews have complained. Material is soft and good quality. We'll see how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Soft Material But Too Thin
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the soft material and the simple design. It fits the Summer changing pad perfectly. You can use oxyclean to remove stains without affecting the grey colors on there. However, the material is a little bit too thin and it’s almost see through. It’s disappointing for the price you pay. I’d be looking for better quality material for the changing pad covers since it’s heavily used.
customer_reviews.author: Clever C

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and nicely made! Fits the changing pad super well too. It is a soft jersey like material that feels really nice. Update: I was a bit worried to begin with as to how these would hold up over time. Baby poop stains so bad and having light colored covers made me nervous. But they clean beautifully! Even after having poo dry in I quick prerinse and a wash and they look like new again! I love these covers and would recommend them to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: fits halo swivel bassinet perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: these bassinet sheets are so cozy and soft and fit my halo swivel bassinet perfectly! you would have thought halo created them for a fraction of the price. i love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting sheets!
customer_reviews.text: We got these not knowing what we liked because we just had our first kid but these are great! They have held up through washes stains come right out. They are a neutral pattern so I liked that! They are soft. A great price for the product and you get two! You can never have enough sheets for a baby!
customer_reviews.author: tan-mcc

customer_reviews.title: They’re also super cute and a plus that they are cotton
customer_reviews.text: I have a Chico Lullago for my baby’s bassinet. It is on the larger side, so standard sized bassinet sheets are too small for it. I ended up getting the changing table size of these sheets and they fit perfectly! They’re also super cute and a plus that they are cotton. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fits awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it wouldn’t fit my sons bassinet. He has a larger one. It’s not like your average bassinet. But it fits good! A little bit. Which I like. I’ve washed and dried it once. Still fits good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Graco Travel Lite Pack n Play w/Stages
customer_reviews.text: The “changing pad” size of these sheets fits the mattress pad that comes with the Travel Lite Pack n Play perfectly. They are very soft and so far have held up after their initial wash. Our baby hasn’t been born yet, so I can’t speak for their overall durability, but so far they seem like the perfect sheets for this model since it’s smaller than a standard pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Petroleum smell and stained
customer_reviews.text: The crib sheets were a terrible choice. I bought the two pack and one of them came with a pink stain and a horrible petroleum smell that won't go away. I washed it twice and it still smells. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: River F.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT sheets for newborns!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and soft sheets! I have the Ingenuity Foldaway Rocking bassinet and these sheets fit PERFECTLY. I love how the stretchy and soft the material is and won't be worried about our baby boy getting entagled in loose sheets! Definitely will be purchasing crib sheets from Ely's&Co!!!
customer_reviews.author: oksanaharhun

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, gender neutral, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have a non standard changing pad size (27x18x4) and it fits great anyway because the elastic goes all the way around and is easy to adjust. Love that it's gender neutral. Holds up well in the wash and does not need ironing. It's not super fitted so there's a bit of a gap between the cover and the bottom curve but that doesn't really bother me and I don't think you can make it super fitted without sacrificing flexibility in changing pad size.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Before first use, wash with softener - arrives a little rough to the touch.
customer_reviews.text: Great for what we needed. Arrived a little rough to the touch, washed a few times with a softener, they turned out just fine. Material is on the thin side; our daughter wore a sleep sack, so this didn't overly bother us.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Tension of elastic too tight
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these sheets except that the tension is too tight. I have a vinyl pad in my bassinet and the elastic was too tight and scrunched up the mattress. I was able to rip the seems out a bit to let the tension out so that it fit just snug enough. Other than that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Made bassinet bottom curl up
customer_reviews.text: Sheets were cute and soft and seemed good quality. I bought them for the bassinet insert in my Graco packnplay. These sheets made the bassinet insert bottom curl up. I could not get it to lay flat, which made it unsafe for baby to sleep in. I had to return these sheets and get the lower quality Graco ones.
customer_reviews.author: TheKlund

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these for almost a year now and they've held up great! They are soft and fit our changing pad well. I love that the pack came with 2 so we always have a clean one to switch out!
customer_reviews.author: K Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Best crib sheet!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sheets! Super soft and easily fit on a crib mattress. I was so tired of sheets shrinking and never fitting on the mattress. These have plenty of material to easily fit, but not come loose or bunch up. We've had them a few months now and even after many washes they still look new. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed they didn’t fit our cradle mattress at all
customer_reviews.text: These do not fit 18 x 36 cradle mattresses as advertised. It did fit our changing pad... so we will just use it as an extra changing pad cover. Disappointed they didn’t fit our cradle mattress at all. The elastics are way too tight and cause the cradle mattress to bow and not lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Sumati

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are decent sheets for the price. They fit fairly well, are easy to put on and remove for our pack and play, and became soft "enough" after a few wash cycles. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandson's pack and play at my house. I tried a regular crib sheet before purchasing these. The crib sheet was to large and fit poorly. These are a perfect fit. They are extremely soft and I love the muted colors. I recommend this to anyone who uses a pack and play instead of a crib.
customer_reviews.author: LNMCG

customer_reviews.title: I guess its good to be tight so not to harmful for the ...
customer_reviews.text: it goes on tight. Only issue is that is really really tight and causes the play pen mattress to squeeze together and not be even so one or two of the 4 panels will be elevated and bother my baby. I guess its good to be tight so not to harmful for the baby but it is too tight.
customer_reviews.author: E. R.

customer_reviews.title: These fit the "newborn napper" mattress in the Baby Trend ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit the "newborn napper" mattress in the Baby Trend Go-Lite ELX Nursery Center - Drip Drop Blue and were so soft! We tried other bassinet sheets (like the Circo oval bassinet sheets, which felt really rought) but these were the only ones we could find that were soft AND fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Soft and thin👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, thin, and stylish for a boy or girl! I thought I was going to put these on our flat diaper changing pad, but our pad is so thin and jankety that it folds in half because of the elastic. However, it WOULD fit if you had a decent pad. We are using it on our contoured pad instead and I love them - fits nicely on that size too.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Decent, easy to use, does the trick
customer_reviews.text: The material is a bit thin, but the changing table gets pretty light use at our house, so I think they’ll hold up fine. Reasonable value for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not quite right.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, well made bassinet sheets with cute designs but they don’t quite work well with my bassinet mattress. The mattress just won’t lay flat with them on. So I’m not sure if the mattress I have is too flimsy or if the sheets just aren’t big enough. I have a delta children’s bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Schipper

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product but didn't fit the mattress :-(
customer_reviews.text: These bassinet covers are wonderfully made and very soft. I only give them a 4 because they did not fit my bassinet mattress (a HALO). The elastic was too tight so it fit around the matress but it wouldn't lie flat. This was a bit misleading as one of the images showed the cover fitting what looked like a halo mattress with the unique hourglass shape. Would like it if they specifically listed, at least for the major brands, what mattresses these will and won't safely fit rather than making it sound like they would fit everything. But if it fits this would be a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sheets, I’ve wash them over and over again and they still look new. Very very soft material. If I need more I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Halphen

customer_reviews.title: Fit pack n play mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Grace pack n play bassinet mattress! I’m so glad I found this item. I didn’t want to lay my son on the bare mattress, the surface was too cold. These crib sheets are soft and the patterns are cute and gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Magday

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and soft jersey material!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby’s pack n play! I have already washed numerous times, and they have held up well and not shrunk. I’m glad I got the two pack to always have a spare when needed! Great neutral colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Size is for a small bassinet!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as It was advertised in the “frequently bought together” with the miclaasic bassinet... this do not dirt that bassinet it would fit a small “classic bassinet” super cute and soft but having to return them. If you want to buy some for the miclassic get the ones that are for “changing pad”
customer_reviews.author: Diana Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and are easy to clean, however, they seem too small for my Graco Pack n Play (but I read beforehand that they would fit). They make the mattress scrunch up.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and breathable which is perfect for summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet , great fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our pack and play mattress we purchased as well. Mattress added some much needed comfort and these sheets were the perfect addition
customer_reviews.author: savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great covers, but shrank a LOT in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great covers, but shrank a LOT in the dryer. They still mostly work, but they are got a little hard to put on the changing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. Fits over the mattress and mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these changing pad covers and have a few. They’re cheaper than other brand changing pad covers but only in expense - the quality is great and they’re easy to clean. I’d highly recommend these over other more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cozy. I love the design. It will look great with most anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk so bad after the second washing that one doesnt fit anymore
customer_reviews.text: Shrunk so bad after the second washing that one doesnt fit anymore. If you need durability these are not the sheets for you. Granted I will admit i did not read the instructions for care but Im not the petson who spends alot of time separating delicates, drycleaning and handwashing. As a busy mom these dont work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: they are an excellent alternative to the fitted sheets Halo has for their ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these for a changing pad but they did not fit well. However, they are an excellent alternative to the fitted sheets Halo has for their bassinet. They fit very well and are easier to put on unlike the fitted sheets from Halo.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Angoco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sheets for our bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We have a Halo bassinet and these sheets fit perfectly - perfect fit and very soft. Much better than the Halo brand fitted sheet (and easier to get on/off). Has held up well in the wash so far.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I just got this pack n play sheet set. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this pack n play sheet set. The pack n play sheets feel very soft and look very durable. It has a thick elastic with a double stitch reinforcement for smooth tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Omg so soft. I love these sheets for our son's crib
customer_reviews.author: sakeena morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This material is nice. They are much softer & more comfortable then the sheets I was using for my daughter prior.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not gender  neutral color
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would be getting a gender neutral changing table cover but instead I got pink. Would have been fine if I was having a girl but I'm not. I reread the description for the product after getting it and there's no place saying pink only gray color. Even the picture is of gray dots and gray chevron lines.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not the right size for me....
customer_reviews.text: I like the fabric, but does not fit my Summer Infant bassinett. I try to force fit every way, but unsuccessful. $20 down the drain. I have to see how else I can use these 2 sheets.
customer_reviews.author: TiffyG

customer_reviews.title: I've been using them for 7 months now and I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: These fit our Graco pack-n-play mattresses perfectly and are very soft. I've been using them for 7 months now and I like them a lot. The light color is more prone to stains but I don't really care. They would be good for boys or girls.
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Smelled of gasoline
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance after reading some reviews that these sheets had a chemical smell and other reviews that loved these sheets. Sure enough, they smelled kind of like gasoline. I washed them twice hoping for the best, but I could still detect the smell. Seemed to be coming from the elastic edge. Anyway, can't take chances with a newborn, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Borchard

customer_reviews.title: Overall great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sheets. I bought them to use for the miclassic bassinet. They fit great, wash well, and are very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unncessary
customer_reviews.text: we found these to be cute but totally unnecessary. we just used changing pad liners as they were easier to just throw on the pad and then wash.
customer_reviews.author: thegirlwhoruns

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with fit, quality and softness of the fitted sheet. It fit nicely over the mattress and mattress pad. So snuggly soft, I want them for my own bed!
customer_reviews.author: CPug

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need it for my son’s play yard.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nice colors. Fit perfectly on my son’s play yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: We liked that they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We liked that they fit perfectly, nice and snug. We liked they were a natural cotton fabric. They seem to be s good value for the price. We washed them before we put them on and they are soft and strong .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. I use them for my baby’s cradle. He falls right to sleep. They are not hot sheets either his body can breathe. I would definitely get more.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfy and fit multiple bassinets!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bassinet sheets! They are the softest material and have a great neutral pattern on them. We purchased them for our home bassinet (Fisher Price Soothing Motions Bassinet) as well as our travel bassinet (Brica Fold 'N Go Bassinet). They fit both perfectly! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these sheets! They are so soft and fit snugly, but easily around the crib mattress. Other brands I have bought in the past are either too abrasive, or don't fit the mattress well and end up tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit arms reach co sleeper mini
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our arms reach co sleeper and they fit perfectly!! Much cheaper then the sheets from arms reach. Great patterns, fabric is light and soft. A little see though but they work!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Boyd

customer_reviews.title: The sheets fit too tight, when I put them ...
customer_reviews.text: The sheets fit too tight, when I put them on the pack and play "mattress" the mattress starts to fold up and it scares me that it could be risk for the baby. It may be a problem with this is design of the pack and play mattress and not the sheet it is hard to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Soft stretchy to fit mattress but don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Soft stretchy to fit mattress but don't move around when in use which gives me peace of mind for safety! Color is a soft gray and perfect for crib/pack play! Don't get hot for little on either! Excellent quality! Love love love these!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: They also have a nice soft feel to them
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use with our Ingenuity FoldAway Rocking Bassinet and the sheets fit perfectly - tight and no bunching. They also have a nice soft feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: These are great I have 2 different Graco pack n plays and they fit both
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: So soft great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets they are so soft and fit perfectly. I got them really for the color and pattern because it matched my daughters room, however they were far better quality than the sheets I spent way too much on before she was born.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, but they don't fit on my 18"x36" cradle mattress at all, and barely fit my changing pad cover (it is too tight to allow slack in the middle where the baby lays). The polka dot one was way smaller than the chevron one too. It was only 32 inches when I stretched it out as much as I could, how is this supposed to fit a 36" mattress? At least the chevron one got to 35." I'm really furious, I bought 2 of these and they are totally unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets! They are very cute, fit the crib mattress perfectly, and are a smooth, cool feel. Very nice product. Will probably buy again in a different print for variety!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Cute sheets, but entirely too small to use in a bassinet. I tried to use them as changing pad covers instead, and they barely fit on that. I was originally going to buy a set for the crib as well, but won't now as they probably wont fit.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft yet durable. Fits our portable crib perfectly! Easy to wash & holds its shape well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hennebry

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect from my Graco Pack N' Play - even fits the nicer mattress I got for it. Nice fabric and ads a touch of home when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: bkmlyn

customer_reviews.title: Soft and the perfect size for the lotus travel crib as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and the perfect size for the lotus travel crib as well as my new baby’s at home mini crib
customer_reviews.author: Nate J

customer_reviews.title: I can put it on but it is super tight, the edges of the pad kinda curl ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it for our Halo bassinest an it is a little too small. I can put it on but it is super tight, the edges of the pad kinda curl up bc it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Fits 29 x 14 mattress
customer_reviews.text: My bassinet mattress is 29 x 14 and these fit great. The material is very soft and breathable. And so nice it comes in a 2 pack!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft, cute. Only using for grandson visits not sure of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Fits the ingenuity bassinet perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found these, my LO has been slipping around after converting into just her bassinet. These fit the ingenuity bassinet perfect! They are super soft and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are great! They appear to be much lighter & have ...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are great! They appear to be much lighter & have a better breathability than the Graco brand of the fitted pack & play sheets. I always be sure to put down some sort of wet proof sheet (puppy pads work great) under just in case of accidents! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara V.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter's bassinet and was surprised at how well they fit the mattress. They were high quality and I think they will be able to withstand a lot of washings. The seller delivered as promised and I was very happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my newborn who sleeps in a graco pack ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my newborn who sleeps in a graco pack and play. I do combine this with a waterproof fitted liner as well. Quality seems good, has held up well during a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice crib sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice crib sheets. They fit snugly and they are soft to the touch. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Gentel

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow so perfect for hot weather, soft and stretchy fabric, great color, great value,
customer_reviews.author: Xhynita001

Unisex for Both Baby Boy and Baby Girl
Fits all Standard Pack N Play , Portable Crib and Playard Mattress including the mattress that comes with the pack n plays and playards. Dimensions 24 x 38 x 5 inches
Snug fit with elastic reinforced twice for durability
